item.title: GeofCox
item.description: What would a truly socialist prime minister say to their country about immigration ?"S√°nchez urged Spaniards to reject stereotypes and hoaxes about migration. In the past decade, 94% of migrants who had arrived in Spain had done so legally, he said. About 40% of them were Latin Americans, 30% hailed from other parts of Europe and 20% were from Africa. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre talking about a diverse migration flow that looks nothing like the image [perpetuated by] the far right.‚Äù"Migrants were more likely to be working than people born in Spain, and less likely to access social services, he said. When age and income levels are taken into account, the rates of delinquency were about the same for both groups, he added."‚ÄúI want citizens to understand that this is not a battle between Spaniards and foreigners, or Christians and Muslims or saints and criminals,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt is a battle between truth and lies, between tales and data, between what is in the interests of our society and the interests of a few who see fear and hatred of foreigners as their only path to power.‚Äù"https://www.theguardian.com/world/2024/oct/09/pedro-sanchez-unveils-plans-to-make-it-easier-for-migrants-to-settle-in-spain

item.title: Glyn Moody
item.description: Labour‚Äôs carbon-capture scheme will be Starmer‚Äôs white elephant: a terrible mistake costing billions - https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2024/oct/11/labour-carbon-capture-climate-breakdown "The supposedly green project ‚Äì brainchild of the previous Tory government ‚Äì will increase emissions, not reduce them" another #starmer stupidity

item.title: d a t green
item.description: The only way the United Kingdom can quit the ECHR is by breaching or re-negotiating the Good Friday Agreement.And Ireland and the nationalist community in the north of Ireland are not going to re-negotiate the GFA so as to remove fundamental rights.No way round this for Jenrick and the Tories.

item.title: George Musser
item.description: Convolutional neural networks‚Äîthe machine-learning systems routinely used for image recognition‚Äîare inherently limited, according to a new study by @lamaral and colleagues. #ConvNets fail on data above a certain threshold of complexity. They lean too heavily on shortcuts‚Äîspurious correlations that don‚Äôt generalize‚Äîand on localized features such as texture, to the neglect of the overall scene. h/t @manlius https://doi.org/10.1063/5.0213905 #AI

item.title: Manlio De Domenico
item.description: Collective behavior of artificial neurons allows memory storage and retrieval, as well as learning. Emergent phenomena.Emergence is the protagonist of the Nobel prize in Physics 2024.Can we quantify emergence? #ComplexSystems #ComplexityThoughts üëâ https://manlius.substack.com/p/a-computational-approach-to-emergenceüëâ https://manlius.substack.com/p/a-computational-approach-to-emergence-536

item.title: Stanley Nerdlinger
item.description:
US voters have correctly picked the winner of the Presidential election in 4 of the last 6 elections
#election2024 #electoralcollege

item.title: Richard Sever
item.description: bioRxiv hit a new record for monthly postings. We continue to see steady growth (at a slightly reduced rate compared with pre-pandemic).The 2020-2022 spike-then-lull is clearly a distortion from the overall trend, and the return to steady growth feels like a signal of a return to normality (albeit a new normal).

item.title: Albert Cardona
item.description: Whole adult fly brain connectome for FAFB (female adult fly brain) ‚Äì last year in preprint form, today as an immersive feature in Nature.140,000 neurons, over 50 million synapses ‚Äì organised into over 8,000 cell types. (VNC not included.)https://www.nature.com/immersive/d42859-024-00053-4/index.htmlThe whole connectome: Dorkenwald et al. 2024 (Seung, Murthy) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07558-yCell types: Schlegel et al. 2024 (Jefferis) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07686-5 by @uni_matrixNetwork statistics: Lin et al. 2024 (Murthy) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07968-yVisual system: Garner et al. 2024 (Wernet, Kim) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07967-z and Matsliah et al. (Murthy, Seung) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07981-1Seung also put out a solo paper on predicting visual function from the connectome: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07953-5Control of halting in walking: Sapkal et al. 2024 (Bidaye) https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-024-07854-7 FAFB imaged by @davi 's group back in 2018: https://www.cell.com/cell/fulltext/S0092-8674(18)30787-6#neuroscience #Drosophila #connectomics #FAFB

item.title: Philipp Schlegel

item.title: Dan Neidle
item.description: The Daily Mail just won the right to say Douglas Barrowman has "cocktail-sausage fingers".And it won the right to say his actions ruined thousands of lives, led to two suicides, and that he lied about his ties to a likely fraudulent tax scheme. Thread.

item.title: ChrisO_wiki
item.description: 1/ Russian milbloggers complain that local Russian commanders are falsely claiming advances in eastern Ukraine. As a result, they say, Russian artillery and air power is not striking settlements that are in reality still held by Ukraine, causing unnecessary Russian casualties. ‚¨áÔ∏è

item.title: Dr. Zalka Csenge Vir√°g
item.description: So, I showed up to my book launch at the literary festival today. Telling Greek and Roman myths, appropriately dressed because why not :)Then I was told 3 minutes before stage time that... my #mythology book is not being sold at the festival.Because... by Hungarian law, you can't sell #lgbtq content within 200 meters of a school.So 8pm, at an adult literary event, I couldn't actually sign. Greek mythology. Because there is a school building nearby.#books #bookstodon #Hungary
